column4: i have 2 ubuntu partitions and i use a livecd to delete the 1st of the 2. both are primaries, but only the first has the boot flag on it. what should i do?
i just choose to enable the boot flag? and thats it?
or do i have to change anything more
what should i do about the boot flag
yea, using a livecd and chroot
you might not even have to use chroot, but i always do, it will allow you to work inside your partition after mounting it in the live cd
anyway is there any guide to fix grub after all this
yeah just google fix grub using live cd idk
